scripts.front: pnpm run env:dev -- pnpm run env:local -- pnpm --filter frontend
scripts.back: pnpm run env:dev -- pnpm run env:local -- pnpm --filter backend
scripts.sdk: pnpm run env:dev -- pnpm run env:local -- pnpm --filter @shared/sdk
scripts.all: pnpm run env:dev -- pnpm run env:local -- pnpm --recursive
